components.name: Screengrab
components.description: A component responsible for capturing screenshots of mobile applications using different strategies.

components.name: ScreenshotStrategy
components.description: An interface that defines the method for taking screenshots, allowing for various implementations like DecorViewScreenshotStrategy and UiAutomatorScreenshotStrategy.

components.name: FileWritingScreenshotCallback
components.description: Handles the saving of captured screenshots to the file system, ensuring proper file management and directory structure.

data_flows.description: Screengrab invokes the takeScreenshot method from the ScreenshotStrategy to capture the application's UI.
Once a screenshot is captured, the strategy passes the image data to the FileWritingScreenshotCallback for storage.

trust_boundaries.name: User Device Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user's device and the Fastlane service, where sensitive data may be exposed.
